featured.text: (4) Between 1970 and 2000, what percentage of the original Amazon Rainforest was cut down?
One of __(34)__ measures is to calculate the percentage of income that people spend on certain necessities.
The higher this percentage is, the __(35)__ is the standard of living of these people.
They also have an 25 flavor and a higher percentage of solids.

definition.zh_def: 百分比，表示某一數量相對於整體的比例，通常以百分之幾表示。
definition.en_def: A fraction or ratio expressed as a part of 100, indicating how much of something there is in relation to the whole.
definition.example: The percentage of students who passed the exam was 85%.
